data.eml:eml: Occurrence of the millipede genus Piccola Attems, 1953 in China (Diplopoda: Polydesmida: Paradoxosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Weixin, Tian, Mingyi (2015): Occurrence of the millipede genus Piccola Attems, 1953 in China (Diplopoda: Polydesmida: Paradoxosomatidae). Zootaxa 3904 (3): 403-408, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.3.5
